description: HTTP transport for Azure IoT device SDK
name: azure-iot-device-http

scripts.alltest-min: istanbul cover --report none node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot test/_*_test*.js
scripts.ci: npm -s run lint && npm -s run build && npm -s run alltest-min && npm -s run check-cover
scripts.test: npm -s run lint && npm -s run build && npm -s run unittest
scripts.unittest-min: istanbul cover --report none node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot test/_*_test.js
